Restart Explorer.ps1: Restarts the Windows Explorer process to refresh the desktop and taskbar.
Create Restore Point.psy: Creates a system restore point to save your current system state.
Uninstall OneDrive.ps1: Completely removes OneDrive from your Windows system.
PluginDebloater.dll: A tool (similar to Bloatynosy) to remove unnecessary pre-installed software from the system.
PluginDebloater.json: Signature file for the Debloater tool. Update this file periodically.
PluginButler.dll: Your smart assistant for Windows, similar to Clippy.
PluginButler.json: Signature file for the Butler tool. Update this file periodically.
Super_God_Mode.ps1: Script that provides access to all Control Panel settings and more. Dev: https://github.com/ThioJoe/Windows-Super-God-Mode/releases
